title: How to Make Hamburger Macaroni and Cheese

steps.headline: Take 3 cups of raw hamburger put in a small bowl
Add 1 teaspoon of seasoned salt and mix well
Add the hamburger to a pan and heat oven top to medium-heat.
Fill the pot halfway with water.
Heat the stove top to high until the water boils.
Stir your hamburger meat every 3-5 minutes.
When the macaroni is soft, take it off heat and place in strainer.
Place the macaroni back in the pot and put heat on low.
steps.description: Add the 1/2 cup milk and cheese. Stir well.

steps.headline: When your hamburger meat is brown add to macaroni.
steps.description: Sprinkle extra seasonings and barbecued sauce for flavor. Add all your vegetables in your macaroni too. Serve.

text: Take 3 cups of raw hamburger put in a small bowl  Add 1 teaspoon of seasoned salt and mix well  Add the hamburger to a pan and heat oven top to medium-heat.  Get a medium cooking pot.  Fill the pot halfway with water.  Heat the stove top to high until the water boils.  Add the macaroni to water.  Stir your hamburger meat every 3-5 minutes.  When the macaroni is soft, take it off heat and place in strainer. Have it drain. Place the macaroni back in the pot and put heat on low. Add the 1/2 cup milk and cheese. Stir well. When your hamburger meat is brown add to macaroni. Sprinkle extra seasonings and barbecued sauce for flavor. Add all your vegetables in your macaroni too. Serve.
